column4: Hey #ubuntu.  I am running ubuntu 11.04 with Xmonad on a new HP Pavilion g4 laptop.  I was previously running the identical setup on an old Acer laptop (both AMD 64 procs; the current one is dual-core)... old box never crashed the whole time I had it.  This one will lock up (screen goes black, only responds to hard reboot) randomly.  CPU/RAM load is never high.
Just wondering if anyone had thoughts on 1) how I can trace the problem and 2) if anyone else experienced similar things on HP laptops
identical as in identical?  You copied it over?
no, but I fresh installed ubuntu 11.04 from the same disk, and installed xmonad identically
